guardian_id_text: You can ask another person to add you as another Guardian for their Spiritus. Send them your own Guardian ID.
delete_err: Unable to delete. Try again later.
delete_modal_subtitle: You must be certain that you want to delete this Spiritus. This action cannot be undone upon completion.
add_guardian_modal_subtitle_2: Ask for their Guardian ID code.
add_guardian_modal_error: Cannot add Guardian. Try again later.
delete_guardian_modal_subtitle_1: Are you sure you want to remove Guardian
404_subtitle: The page you are looking for could not be found.
400_subtitle: You are not authorized to access this page. Please sign in to continue or contact us in case you need assistence.
crop_dialog_subtitle:
Profile images are required to be 192x220 pixel images.
Drag the image in the box to position it and use the zoom or rotate functions to adjust the image.
crop_dialog_preview_subtitle: This is how your profile image will look like.
